column4: can someone help me with my sound card problem, I'm having asus xonar DG and no sound... Using ubuntu 10.04 and alsa 1.0.24
my alsamixer doesnt show the card if I hit f6 but it is shown in lspci
also there is arrows on the right, can you see more bars when you go right?
what does it matter if that card is my INTEGRATED one
the first screen always shows the card that is in use
can you show me the screen to the right please?
hmm, not sure what spdif d is but that is muted
see the MM's in the bars? press m on those to unmute them
i prefer to keep it in channel please
i don't know how to do that
maybe the driver just isn't there for 10.04 (are you using 10.04?)
i'd get 12.04 if i were you, its suprisingly good
